abstract: New Jersey State Sen Thomas H Kean Jr is proposing compromise measure to bolster oversight and transparency at Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, hoping to overcome standoff after New York Gov Andrew Cuomo and New Jersey Gov Chris Christie each vetoed reform bill that both state legislatures had unanimously passed.
lead_paragraph: The legislation before the New Jersey State Senate aims to increase transparency following the scandal of politically motivated lane closings at the George Washington Bridge in September 2013.

headline.main: New Bill Calls for More Port Authority Oversight in Effort to Break Deadlock
headline.print_headline: New Bill Calls for More Port Authority Oversight in Effort to Break Deadlock

snippet: The legislation before the New Jersey State Senate aims to increase transparency following the scandal of politically motivated lane closings at the George Washington Bridge in September 2013.
